description: Bright and updated 3 bedroom, 3 bath townhouse in Westside Manor, a sought-after, family and pet-friendly community in West Maple Ridge. This spacious 1,295 sq ft duplex-style end unit offers an abundance of natural light, updated kitchen, and a large living room with a cozy gas fireplace. Upstairs features 3 generous bedrooms, including a primary suite with balcony, and full ensuite. Enjoy a fully fenced yard with a big patio & gazebo, perfect for kids and upto 3 pets. Other highlights include a single garage with built-in shelving, plus 1 open parking stall, plenty of street parking, gas furnace, central vacuum and central A/Câ€¦ all in a convenient location close to schools, parks, shopping, and transit.
